gameCopied: Xax hawaq' copiar hun sajach ti'
instructions: Chuh hawilwen hawalniloj hun tzoti' ti' yinh {{tries}} el. Lahwi hawilwenoj hun-hun el, chhelmojtoj yelaw hej tz'ib', yuhnhe skolwahoj yalni tawet ta ha' hawekoj mato machoj.
correctSpotInstructions: Hune' B' ti' ayiktoj sxol tzoti'. K'ul hawekoj.
wrongSpotInstructions: Ayiktoj N sxol hun tzoti' ti', tonhe machtaj b'et ti' ch'oktoj.
notInWordInstructions: Machiktoj O sxol hun tzoti' ti'.
bestStreak: B'ay tet sajachil q'a' k'ul x'elikoj
winMessages: Jalni han ta mach chub' hawuh
aboutAuthorSentence: Ay hune' kaw b'ab'el sajach b'ay xnawitij hune' sajach yet Wordle ti', yuh xin, ayxa yinh ab'xub'al {{language}}, munlanheb'il yuh ya' <3>{{author}}</3>.
aboutCodeSentence: Yinh hune' <1>código original</1> ti' x'eltj hune' sajach ti', yet ya' <3>Hannah Park</3>, chuh hawilnipax hunxa ti' la: <5>fork yet ya' Aidan Pine</5>, chuh hawatx'enpax hawet yul hawab'xub'al.
aboutDataSentence: B'et ti' chuh snachah hunq'ahan tzoti' yet hun sajach ti' hawuh la: <1>{{wordListSource}}</1>.
aboutOriginalSentence: Chuh hasajchipax yinh hune' b'ab'el sajach munlanheb'il b'ey ti' la: <1>aquí</1>
